sentences.sContent: You have your whole life ahead of you!

sentences.sCn: 他的整个态度都让我讨厌。

sentences.sContent: We ate the whole cake in about ten minutes.
sentences.sCn: 大约十分钟的时间，我们就把整个蛋糕都给吃完了。

sentences.sContent: The whole thing (= everything about the situation ) just makes me sick.
We just sat around and watched TV the whole time (= the only thing we did was watch television ).
sentences.sCn: 我们一直都只是坐着看看电视。

sentences.sContent: I don’t believe she’s telling us the whole story (= all the facts ).
sentences.sCn: 我认为她没有告诉我们全部实情。

sentences.sContent: It was months before the whole truth came out.
sentences.sCn: 几个月以后才真相大白。

phrases.pCn: 基本上，大体上；就全体而论
一生；终身保险；终身寿险
全血（未除去任何成分的血液）；全血亲
全部时间（自始至终）；一向
崭新的世界（电影《阿拉丁》主题曲）
全麦粉（保存全部的营养成分的面粉）

words.tran: 健全的；有益健康的；合乎卫生的；审慎的
卫生地；有益健康地；审慎地；安全地

trans.tranOther: something that consists of a number of parts, but is considered as a single unit
